official_title: A joint resolution to rescind H. J. Res. 364 as passed by the 98th Congress and require submission by the President of the report on U.S. armed forces in Lebanon required by the War Powers Resolution; to require withdrawal of U.S. armed forces from Lebanon if said report is not timely received.

summary.text: Rescinds the Multinational Force in Lebanon Resolution (Public Law 98-119). Requires the President to submit a specified report to Congress, as required under the War Powers Resolution, dealing with the U.S. armed forces in Lebanon. Provides that if such report is not filed with Congress by the President, the deployment of U.S. armed forces in Lebanon shall be terminated except for those necessary for the protection of diplomatic personnel in the U.S. Embassy in Lebanon.

titles.title: A joint resolution to rescind H. J.
